subject: feat(query): default connections to any direction, hops respect NOT filters
body:
Connection filters ("Connected by") now default to "Any direction" instead
of "Incoming" â€” the most intuitive starting point for non-technical users.
Dropdown reordered so "Any direction" appears first.

Hop expansion now respects negated (NOT) filters from the query. Nodes
explicitly excluded via NOT filters won't be pulled back in through hop
traversal. The exclusion predicate is built from negated BuilderFilter
ASTs in QueryBuilder and passed to expandByHops as a generic predicate.
